bug.short_desc: crash after: SEARCH ALL ... HEADER X-Spam-Level ...

long_desc.thetext:
Created an attachment (id=1481) cyrus debug with SEARCH that breaks cyrus
Using filter in pine breaks the connection in cyrus when the user or example search the header lines about:
SEARCH ALL 1:1681 HEADER X-Spam-Level "*******"
When I tried to insert a extra blank into the .pinerc so that pine send:
SEARCH ALL 1:1683 HEADER " X-Spam-Level" "*******"
everything works fine.
Created an attachment (id=1482) cyrus debug with SEARCH with inserted extra blank that works

Created an attachment (id=1483) Proposed patch against 2.3.18
Werner, can you please try this patch.
Thanks for your fast help, we would try this patch against the Sources from cyrus from our Distrubution (SLES11) next week.
Hello, this patch fixed our problem. Thanks, Werner Frerichs
I'll let Bron push this into 2.3. Or ignore it, which comes easier.

attachment.desc: cyrus debug with SEARCH that breaks cyrus
cyrus debug with SEARCH with inserted extra blank that works
